name: SuperAgentsArena
description:
Super Agents Arena is a game jam project made in Level.up Malaysia, 2017, by a group of 4 talented, dedicated jammers.

With their permissions, I uploaded the game here so everyone can enjoy. 

Up to 4 local players can battle with each other. 

There are 4 different characters to choose from, and each has its own unique special weapons. 

Note

- Need 3 xbox controllers

Credits:

Dushanth Daniel Ray Awesome Game Designer

Kevin Yap Genius Game Programmer

Lee Li Xuan Super Graphic Designer

Leo Chang Just Another Indie Game Developer
